com.github.wuic.config

Class AbstractObjectBuilder<T>

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.github.wuic.config.AbstractObjectBuilder<T>
  • Type Parameters:
    T - the type of built objects
    All Implemented Interfaces:
    ObjectBuilder<T>

    public abstract class AbstractObjectBuilder<T>
extends Object
implements ObjectBuilder<T>

    Abstract implementation of what is a ObjectBuilder. It is composed of a set of PropertySetter used to configure it before to call the ObjectBuilder.build() method.

    Since:
    0.4.0
    Version:
    1.0
    Author:
    Guillaume DROUET

        protected Object[] getAllProperties()

        the properties

      • property

        public ObjectBuilder<T> property(String key,
                        Object value)

        Decorates this builder with a property.

        Throws an IllegalArgumentException if the property key is not supported or if the value is incorrect.

        Specified by:
        property in interface ObjectBuilder<T>
        Parameters:
        key - the key
        value - the value
        Returns:
        a builder taking in consideration the new property

      • disableSupport

        public ObjectBuilder<T> disableSupport(String key,
                              Object value)

        Disables the support of a property with a particular value. Any future setting which match the given key/value pair (when calling ObjectBuilder.property(String, Object)) will result in an IllegalArgumentException.

        Specified by:
        disableSupport in interface ObjectBuilder<T>
        Parameters:
        key - the key
        value - the value
        Returns:
        a builder taking in consideration the new setting

      • property

        public Object property(String key)

        Gets the property identified by the given key.

        Throws an IllegalArgumentException if the property key is not supported.

        Specified by:
        property in interface ObjectBuilder<T>
        Parameters:
        key - the key
        Returns:
        the value associated to the key

      • build

        public T build()

        Builds a new NutDao thanks to the current state of this builder.

        If the NutDao could not be built, then an IllegalArgumentException should be thrown.

        Specified by:
        build in interface ObjectBuilder<T>
        Returns:
        the new NutDao

      • internalBuild

        protected abstract T internalBuild()

        Builds internally an object as specified by ObjectBuilder.build() without catching any exception.

        Returns:
        the object
